website_summaries.verdict: Great shoes for skating and just as good for daily wear.
pros: Comes in ash/white, black/white, collegiate navy/white, core black/white/scarlet and grey/white/scarlet
Upper is suede, canvas or synethic nubuck (depends upon color), synthetic leather 3-stripe design, vulcanized leather outsole, herringbone tread pattern

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Adidas and when I came across these hot pink and grey Adidas I had to have them. They are a skater type shoe. Not much padding and are very flat. I find them comfortable when I wear them and I love the colors. I wear a womans size 7.5 shoe and I fit big kids 6.5
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Women with little feet
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable. I've owned several pairs throughout the years. Happy that they come in canvas now, not just suede like they use to; much easier to care for! I am a small woman so I find it cheaper to buy a child's size. By the way, woman's US 5.5 (mens size 4) is the same as a child's (big kid) 3...
customer_reviews.author: Amy and Billy

customer_reviews.title: Bigger Than Expected!
customer_reviews.text: Very good price for the size I bought (4 big kids) but it was waaaay too big for me. Very sad I won't be able to get another size for the same price. (Too expensive) I attached some photos. Where my thumb is is where the top of my big toe is located
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe, prefect fit
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome! My 7yr old son wears a size 1 so I ordered the 1.5 so he could grow into them and they fit so good! He loves them, he says they're the most comfortable shoes ever. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KoKo

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are the second pair of adidas seeley J shoes I've purchased for my Son and I absolutely love them! They look so cute on him and fit well,He Has a bit of a wider foot and these fit him comfortabley.
customer_reviews.author: TW23

customer_reviews.title: they fit perfect. They are cute and comfortable as well
customer_reviews.text: These look exactly as in the picture. Bought them for my 8 year old niece; they fit perfect. They are cute and comfortable as well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Fiore10

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, son loves them.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son (size 5). They do run a tad larger but not enough to cause any issues. Great for kids who are expected to grow. That was my worry. Buy shoes that fit and outgrow them in less then 6 months. Great shoes, son loves them.
customer_reviews.author: RedmondIvy

customer_reviews.title: These are good shoes but if you have wide feet these will ...
customer_reviews.text: These are good shoes but if you have wide feet these will be too narrow. It was so for my son and had to return them
customer_reviews.author: Oasis in the desert

customer_reviews.title: Too Big but Super Cool
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them. Perfect for daily use but run about a size bigger than other shoes. I'm buying size 12 right now for my son in other shoes but these are just too big. It's okay though. He grows so fast that I'll just wait a few months before putting them in him.
customer_reviews.author: Bambikha

customer_reviews.title: no OK
customer_reviews.text: The quality is not good, my son wore more than a month to wear out
customer_reviews.author: adela.k

customer_reviews.title: but the rest of both the shoes still look great. I bought them mid-summer
customer_reviews.text: My son 6 yr. old loves these. They were a bit too narrow at first- he has wide feet, but he they gave a lot after a few wears. I had to relace the laces, but the rest of both the shoes still look great. I bought them mid-summer, & he wore them almost everyday for a month.
customer_reviews.author: L.Johns

customer_reviews.title: Love these. wish there were more colors for this ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality shoe. Love these. wish there were more colors for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Cute for boy or a girl.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Mild and unisex for our 3 year old little girl's play time/bike riding with her older brother. Super cute and affordable enough not to upset me when they head towards the mud.
customer_reviews.author: QueenieMarie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes I've ever bought! Adidas is a good brand for foot support.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: He wears them every day and skates pretty hard so I am happy with the durability and ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have lasted longer than any other skate shoes I've bought for my son. He wears them every day and skates pretty hard so I am happy with the durability and happy that he likes them.
customer_reviews.author: L. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit great and look great. My son loves them. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: AMANDA CHAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Adorable sneakers for a woman
customer_reviews.text: Super adorable. I wear a size 7 in womens, but a 5 in Big Kids. This shoe is a smidge longer; but still the fit is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: LMG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very neath and comfortable my grandson love it thank you .
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected they look cute but they got dirty to quick and the quality of the sneakers not ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected they look cute but they got dirty to quick and the quality of the sneakers not that great
customer_reviews.author: karissa

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: These fit PERFECTLY! Comfortable and look great....VERY happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Think these run pretty true to size
customer_reviews.text: Think these run pretty true to size... 2 weeks in and so far so good. Our 5 year old days they're very comfortable and we love the look
customer_reviews.author: bandit king

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful shoe..too bad I ordered the wrong size 😒
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: My son loved it
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly to my son . He's 11 yr old and weight 85 lbs ..
customer_reviews.author: les81

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: great sneakers for my son to wear with his uniforms to school. They are cut really big. What a great price
customer_reviews.author: Patacake Diaper Cakes

customer_reviews.title: Only downside is that it get dirty easily.
customer_reviews.text: Son loves them and only wears them on certain days. Only downside is that it get dirty easily.
customer_reviews.author: Martin De La Plum

customer_reviews.title: Every boy needs a pair
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super cute. They are sleek and classic! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Marquetta J. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels great but they are a tad too big
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels great but they are a tad too big. But I can make them work for the deal. They don't slip and they look good.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Happpy Hip Hop Dancer
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son to wear in hip hop class. So far, he has had no complaints and they seem to be holing up really well. Easy to break in.
customer_reviews.author: B.Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoes!! They are a little big like the other comments are saying, but that means you can wear them longer. I was going to use them to skate in but they look to good 😂😂😂.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves these. Too soon to tell how ...
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves these. Too soon to tell how well they will hold up. He's a little rough on shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sommer

customer_reviews.title: A little narrow
customer_reviews.text: I read all the other reviews and they all said that this shoe runs big so I got a half size smaller, it was a little tight at first but I loosened them up and they fit amazingly.
customer_reviews.author: Karlee Hulstrom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My boy liked them a lot!!! Will buy another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect size 10.5 for my 4 year old and they are made really nicely.
customer_reviews.author: annastuashia murphy

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes. Fit perfect. Loved the price, just what my child needed for back to school.
customer_reviews.author: Violet Holley

customer_reviews.title: They fit him good and he wears them all the time
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son. They fit him good and he wears them all the time,so they must be comfortable. They look really nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Overall nice shoe and comfortable feel. It fit somewhat small.
customer_reviews.author: Kaiolivares

customer_reviews.title: Cute and good price
customer_reviews.text: I wear a women's 7.5 purchased a 5.5 and they fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Recendiz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and they seem to fit a little larger than what they should. Still cute.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my son. They fit true to size and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Mkmartin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected for my wife. Shes a size 7 in women size 5 in kids fit just right.

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and great fit!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her shoes! Fast shipping and great fit!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoes. Thanks to the previous reviews I bought the right size .

customer_reviews.title: My sister like it very
customer_reviews.text: it is a gift for my sister,My sister like it very much

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Adidas are my favorite brand and they fit true to size. Very comfortable. Received many compliments.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: So awesome. .... they fit and they dont hurt her feet

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the shoes they were just a bit to big.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes, but won't last long...especially if your boys are active!
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This product fit me as expected. I am a size 7 in woman and I bought a size 5 big kids. I bought the all black ones and they are really nice and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: VLD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Came earlier than I expected ! The packaging was great, fits right for I have small feet (: I am a satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: Lucero

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a 10 year old. After 2nd time wearing the zipper broke. Gave a bad review. Company offered a replacement for a better review. Took them up on their offer and said I'd change my review depending on how the replacement jeans worked out. 1st time he wore the 2nd pair the zipper broke. These are not worth the money even though the company who sold them went good for them.
customer_reviews.author: earl godsoe

product_meta.title: adidas Originals Seeley J Shoe (Little Kid/Big Kid)
product_meta.description: Inspired by retro sneakers, these kids' skate shoes are updated with an all-canvas upper, synthetic leather 3-stripes and a vulcanized outsole.
feature_bullets: Synthetic leather signature 3-Stripe overlays at sides
